articles.title: WATCH: Steve Harvey flirts with Devi Sankaree Govender while on her show - IOL
articles.description: American comedian Steve Harvey seems to love more than just the South African weather.
articles.content:
There is no denying that US comedian Steve Harvey loves South Africa. The star has made that abundantly clear, but it turns out he might also love South African women, not that we blame him.

articles.title: Singapore, US affirm 'vital' American presence in region as defence chiefs meet - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The United States' presence in the region is "vital for its peace, prosperity, and stability", Singapore and the US affirmed on Tuesday (Jul 27) during the inaugural visit of Secretary of Defense Lloyd J Austin III to Singapore.
